bibl.title: Egyptian Bankers and Bank Receipts in Hellenistic and Early Roman Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.note: 1. Bankers and their cultural background in early Ptolemaic Egypt. - 2. Demotic and bilingual bank documents in Ptolemaic Egypt. - 3. Bankers in Early Roman Egypt.
